meta_description: Chrome Extension provide the function of load subtitles from user local and SubtitleX library
extension_description: Immersive multilingual subtitles for online videos.
h_d_1: Automatically load subtitle if the video has been collected
h_d_2: Over {{number}} video has been collected and still growing
h_d_6: Free to use, and update frequently
HEAD_2: IT IS SUPER EASY TO USE
h_2_d_1: Icon of SubtitleX will show on the control bar of video after the page loaded( might delay a few seconds impacted by internet speed). If you didn't see it please reload the page or contact with developer.
h_2_d_2: Click the icon, you will see the panel of SubtitleX, all operations were located here.
h_2_d_3: Search or get subtitle files by your self, load it with this button.
h_2_d_4: If the subtitles of video on current page have already been collected by SubtitleX database, you should be able to select subtitles from here.
h_2_d_5: Loaded subtitle will show under the video, position is draggable. You can adjust the font-size, background, hide/show ,and the time synchronization in SubtitleX panel.
sub_desc_1: {{number}} subtitles per day from subtitlex database
sub_desc_2: {{number}} subtitles per day from subtitlex database

jav_meta_description: Free searching and download subtitles (captions) in multiple languages for Japanese adult videos (JAV).
jav_HEAD_1: Discover millions of JAV subtitles with subtitlex.xyz!
jav_DESCRIPTION_1: Search, download, and enjoy using our extensive library with a massive amount of over 150,000 subtitles for more than 30,000 Japanese Adult Videos (JAVs) collected when building the Subtitlex.xyz
jav_DESCRIPTION_2: Subtitlex.xyz is a comprehensive database of subtitles for online videos, curated from the internet and produced with fast-whisper. Our mission is to democratize access to high-quality subtitles, fostering community around sharing, learning, and enjoying the video content. Join us in our mission to make intelligent subtitles!
